Text: Freakin awesome monitor, simple but spot on, this is the most handy app I have found in ages, thanks a ton bro, clean and works flawless.
Its now DU Meter 6.03 hope you can upload that too!
Btw anyone using this version gets a pop from Hagel that says you are using pirated software? Along with my vpn ip. I thought its fully cracked
@ XtraZoom I had that one too just this morning :(

Ok, I found a what seems to be a workaround for those having problems with the message "pirated software bla bla bla" ....

1) add the following lines to the end of your WindowsSystem32DriversetcHosts :

127.0.0.1 www.dumeter.com
127.0.0.1 dumeter.com
127.0.0.1 www.hageltech.com
127.0.0.1 hageltech.com

2) Add the following keys to your registry:

REGEDIT4

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREHagelDU MeterRegistration]
"IID"="adea8665969445cf879d0f350888eaf9"
"UserName"="LiveLong"
"SerialNum"="00000-00000-00000-00000-00000"

[HKEY_CURRENT_USERSoftwareHagelDU MeterRegistration]
"IID"="adea8665969445cf879d0f350888eaf9"
"UserName"="LiveLong"
"SerialNum"="00000-00000-00000-00000-00000"


Seems to be working for me!

MrCabana, I am no longer using this version, I have been using the 6.03 dl from some foreign lang site probably russian. It uses a patch/crack named dum5.0x_patch

Google it or use Filestube to look for latest DU Meter

Just installed 6.05 also seems to be same patch/crack. Normal I prefer fixed exe to a crack but so far after using 6.03 for several days there is no issues and no annoying pirated software popup.
@XtraZoom your given file "dum5.0x_patch" is contain virus dude.

h4hammad, KIS2013 never warn me about any virus however Malwarebytes Anti Malware did warn me. I have no issues using it. I don't see any virus/trojans popup after using it. However I cannot guarantee it is virus free only that I don't have issues using it. Might be false positives or might not. Most patches will show up as virus/trojans which is why I normally use fixed exe but this current fixed exe have piracy popups.
